_header: The Fathers Son of heaven bliss / Of a pure Maid man become is
_description: A song of the Nativity, in James Ryman’s songbook — three 4-line stanzas (aaab) with ‘Te deum’ refrain and burden(bb): ‘Dulciter pangamus / Te deum laudamus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
The ffaders sonne of heuen blisOf a pure meyde man becum
                    ys…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…ffulle sweetly sunge to that lorde þoTe deum
                        laudamus

            1977: 207-8; 1977, 184.
